personalInfo.bio: I am a Software Engineer with a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, majoring in AI. My current passion lies in backend development, specifically with Java. I love building scalable systems and solving complex problems.

projects.title: Real-Time Chat Application with Friend Management System
projects.summary: A Full-Stack application that allows users to chat in real-time and manage their friends.
bullets: Engineered a high-performance full-stack chat application utilizing Next.js 16 and Spring Boot, enabling seamless real-time communication for users.
Implemented a robust real-time messaging system using WebSocket (STOMP/SockJS), reducing message latency to under 100ms and supporting features like live typing indicators and online presence status.
Developed a comprehensive friend management system, allowing users to search, request, accept, and block connections with instant UI updates.
Secured user data and sessions by implementing Spring Security with JWT authentication, ensuring safe stateless authentication and protected API endpoints.
Designed a modern, responsive user interface with Tailwind CSS 4, dark mode support, and smooth CSS animations for a premium user experience.

projects.title: Todo List Application
projects.summary: A Full-Stack application that allows users to add, update, and delete tasks.
bullets: Built a RESTful Todo List API using Spring Boot with JWT authentication and Spring Security for user management and access control.
Implemented CRUD operations for users, Todolists, and tasks using Spring Data JPA and PostgreSQL.
Documented all endpoints with SpringDoc OpenAPI for easy API testing and integration.
Integrated the backend with a vanilla JavaScript frontend that handles login, registration, and dynamic list/task management through Fetch API.
Deployed and tested both components locally and on Railway for production-ready use.
